alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 11:40AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lonoke, eastern Grant, northeastern Dallas, Jefferson, southeastern Saline and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1140 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Redfield to 7 miles southeast of Dogwood. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Sheridan... White Hall... England... Redfield... Altheimer... Humnoke... Orion... Hensley Island... Cottondale... Linwood... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Madding... Warbritton... Richardson... Lamont... Sulphur Springs... Wabbaseka... Allport... Coy... This includes Interstate 530 between mile markers 13 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Dallas; Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline
